name: Dita
description:
We've raided Granny's sherry cupboard in search of the loveliest crystal decanters to re-purpose into elegant table lamps. Professionally wired with a scarlet silken flex and aged brass fittings Dita measures 27cm high. Topped with the cutest of mini- scalloped shades with a hand-sewn cover of Chelwood vintage barkcloth. Features huge ruby red rose blooms with a soft grey foliage and finished with a deep and silky red fringe. 
Available to purchase together or separately as a lamp and/or shade.

name: Amelia Halfball Patchwork
description:
35cm d
28 h

name: Nelly Crystal Decanter Lamp
description:
We've raided Granny's sherry cupboard in search of the loveliest crystal decanters to re-purpose into elegant table lamps. 

Professionally wired with a deep pink silken flex and aged brass fittings Nelly measures 30cm high. Topped with the cutest oval bowed empire shade with a hand-sewn cover of Bluebell vintage barkcloth. Features delicate bluebells in every hue of blue/mauve and pink finished with a deep pink velvet trim.

NB: The oval shape of the shade makes it ideal for a small space against a wall, shelf or mirror. 
Available to purchase together or separately as a lamp and/or shade.

name: Chelwood X Large Retro Tapered Lampshade
description:
Chelwood is a 1950s cotton barkcloth featuring oversized blooms of deep red and rose pink roses. The smokey grey foliage and simple colour palette renders it a contemporary feel.

Used  here on a handrolled lampshade in our extra large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s.  Just ask us for a spider to convert the duplex ring to a pendant fitting if you'd prefer  to hang it as an oversize ceiling pendant as photographed. 1 of only 2 made. Measures 38cm (15") high and 51cm (20") diameter.

Do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you love the Chelwood fabric but are looking for an alternative shape or size shade at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

All FollyandGlee lampshades are made with a flame retardant lampshade PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

name: Metallic Christmas Tulip Lampshade form
description:
A shiney new addition to our range of unadorned lampshade frames in the beautiful tulip shade. Ready for you to decorate as you wish. Tinsel perhaps or classic green ivy/mistletoe ? Or why not add mini-pegs and use your lampshade frame as the basis for a unique advent calender or card display. 

Available in old gold/silver/copper finish.

Our large tulip shade measures 41 cm (16" ) base diameter and is 25cm (9 1/2") high. Fitted with a European pendant aperture (42mm) that fits those trendy coloured flex lamp holders plus a converter for UK (28mm) light fittings.

name: Snowy Mountain Chalet Lampshade
description:
If you have a lover of the ski slopes in the family then you've just found them the perfect gift. A vintage cotton barkcloth lampshade hand rolled  using original barkcloth from the 1950s. Fabulous mountain top scenes with colours so crisp and fresh you feel you are there.

One of just three made.

The drum lampshade photographed measure 20cm (8")diameter and 23cm (9")high. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you are interested in a MountainChalet shade but in a larger size.

We use professional quality and fire retardant lampshade PVC and each is fitted with a adjustor for UK and European light fittings.

name: ChocolateGold patchwork cushion
description:
Striking vintage cotton barkcloths in chocolate and gold join forces to create a stunning cushion. The back is as lovely as the front and is finished with the cutest hand covered buttons. Measures 40cm square (approx). Complete with the softest feather pad.

Every one of these cushions is completely unique. We only use the  original vintage barkcloths from the 1950's and 60's. The exact pattern layout with vary slightly as each cushion is unique.

name: Mini-Lampshades Festoon Lighting
description:
We'll shortly be taking orders for our very lovely vintage mini-lampshade festoon light garlands. There are now 7 different shade frames available all in miniature form. All sewn and trimmed by hand.

These were a great favourite at vintage style weddings throughout the summer gracing marquees and receptions up and down the land. We can't wait to show how lovely they are made up in christmassy barkcloths. 

Numbers will be very limited so do register your interest at hello@follyandglee.co.uk and you'll be the first to know when they are ready.

name: Cut and Fold Christmas Cards
description: Pack of six cut and fold christmas characters. Really striking mid-century designs based on original artwork from the 1950s.

name: Advent Calendar Peg Rail
description:
Hand painted wooden rail with 24 numbered pegs ready and waiting to hold your advent treats. Easy to hang with its own cotton rope or why not place above the mantle or on a shelf?

Perfect with our mini advent boxes kit.

name: Garbo scallop bell lampshade
description:
Garbo is a striking original vintage barkcloth featuring black  long stemmed roses on a soft green background. Soft and sophisticated. Handsewn and finished with an organic cottom trim Garbo measures 12" (31cm) bottom diameter and is 11 3/4" (30cm) tall. 

The frame is fitted with a  reversible gimble - that's the moveable arm thingy that lets you hang it as a ceiling pendant or use it as a table lamp.

name: Bewley Large Scallop Bell Lampshade
description:
A traditional soft-sided scalloped bell lampshade with a handsewn cover of vintage floral barkcloth called Bewley. Granny-chic at its best - an abundance of pink and yellow roses with soft green and teal foliage on a plaster coloured background. floral blooms  Finshed with  an ivory coloured organic cotton trim. 

Perfect for a standard floor lamp but great fun as a ceiling pendant if you have high ceilings. Just ask us for the relevant fitting. 

Bewley measures 46cm (18" ) base diameter and is 36cm (14 ") high.

If you'd like Bewley in a smaller size just get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

options.name: Fitted with shade carrier for standard lamp
fitted with spider for ceiling pendant

name: Burleigh 20cm drum
description:
Stunning original vintage barkcloth called Burleigh makes the most amazing lampshades that are particularly stunning when lit.  Deeper burnt orange and chocolate background with beautifully detailed black tree silhouettes. The drum lampshade photographed measure 20cm (8")diameter and 23cm (9")high. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you are interested in a Burleigh shade but in a larger size.

We use professional quality and fire retardant lampshade PVC and each is fitted with a adjustor for UK and European light fittings.

name: Linen covered lamp cable
description:
Treat your lamps to a real linen textile light cable or flex. Adds such a great vintage look and bags of soul instantly. 

Triple-pole cord with fabric canvas cover with ground wire. Works really well with both our porcelain and aged bronxe bulb holders.

Price per metre length.

name: Vintage 1930s Suffolk Puff or "Yo Yo" Lampshade
description:
Lampshade of fire retardant laminate inner and a glorious outer coat of little "suffolk puffs" or "yo yo's"handsewn from original 1930s vintage cottons. Each was painstakingly rescued from a vintage bedcover and reconstructed before being lined with another 1930s cotton.

A VERY limited number available on a made to order basis to your choice of size.  The photograph shows a shade that is 20cm diameter and 22cm tall - the perfect size for a small table lamp.  A 30 or 35cm diameter shade is a popular size for a ceiling pendant and the tall 35cm diameter shade would suit a slim standard lamp. Please get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you would like to order a different size.

name: Lisbet Patchwork Double Scallop Standard Lampshade
description:
A traditional soft sided lampshade handsewn in a patchwork of original vintage barkcloths - we've called her Lisbet.
Lisbet is a patchwork of very collectible cotton barkcloths from the 1950s and 1960s all featuring very pretty florals in shades of blue, green and turquoise with a touch of mauve. Finished with a cotton gimp trim in a mix of the same shades and a 1950s original cotton fringe.

All our vintage barkcloths are either highly collectible new old stock off the roll or have been lovingly repurposed from curtains etc. Given the very limited quantity of each fabric we rarely make more than 3 or 4 shades from each fabric guaranteeing you won't see them anywhere else.
Love the patchwork of vintage fabrics but looking for a different size or shape shade? Get in touch as we are always happy to create bespoke lampshades just for you.

The shade is fitted with a UK fitting for a standard floor lamp.
Our x large double scallop shade measures 56cm (22") base diameter and 46cm (18") high. Perfect for a standard floor lamp. Lots of other sizes available on request starting at a tiny mini 5" version.

name: Joshana Vintage barkcloth 45cm lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a vintage cotton barkcloth fabric called Joshana and  a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Joshana is an original barkcloth from the 1970s featuring a stylish mix of yellow and orange graphics and pink floral designs. Stunning.   Last one of  ONLY 3 made. 

Pictured is our large drum shade measuring 45cm (18")diameter and 25 cm (10")high.  The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. 

Our lampshades are made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. We have lots of beautiful vintage and retro fabrics so if you don't see the perfect shade here then please get in touch and we''ll be happy  to discuss making up something just for you.

name: Aged Bronze Lamp Fitting
description:
An aged metal bulb holder in Bronze. Made in Britain for a ES standard screw lightbulbs. Diameter 38mm. Removeable shade ring 48mm.

Combine with any length of our cloth covered flex for a fabulous light fitting from which to hang your shade or vintage style bulb.
Flex available to buy seperately.

name: Posybell xLarge Scallop Lampshade
description:
A traditional soft-sided scalloped bell lampshade with a handsewn cover of vintage floral barkcloth called Posy. Very granny-chic - beautiful pale pink rose blooms with foliage in a soft green and oyster grey. Finshed with a choice of a pale pink cotton/acrylic mix or an ivory coloured organic cotton trim. 

Designed for a standard floor lamp but great fun as an oversize ceiling pendant if you have high ceilings. Just as us for the relevant fitting. 

Posybell measures 56cm (22" ) base diameter and is 38cm (15 1/2") high.

If you'd like Posybell in a smaller size just get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: O'Hara 20" Lampshade Frame
description:
A re-invented classic ghost lampshade frame shape ready for you to wrap with your favourite fabrics, paint your choice of colour or even re-cover the traditional way. 

Our O'Hara frame resembles Scarlett O'Hara's shape with the balloon skirt and nipped in waist. It measures 52 cm (20" ) base diameter and is 41cm (16") high and are powdercoated white.

The frame is fitted with a fixed gimble for use with a standard floor lamp. 

NB: If covering your lamp shade frame do please take care to ensure that you use a low wattage light bulb and that any bulb is at least 5cm away from the sides of the shade and treat fabric with a flame retardant spray.

name: Daisy Vintage Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from avery lovely vintage cotton barkcloth and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Daisy hails from the USA (some of you might recognise her from the Mossy Shed) - she has a fresh country vibe  with white, and yellow, daisies plus other orange field and wild flowers.  ONE OF ONLY 3 made.

Pictured is our medium drum shade measures 35cm (14")diameter and 24cm (9 1/2")high. The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. For other sizes/shapes available see listing or make us a special request request to hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

Our lampshades are made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. We have lots of beautiful vintage and retro fabrics so if you don't see the perfect shade here then please get in touch and we''ll be happy to discuss making up something just for you.

name: Maddison Vintage Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from one of all time favourite vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Maddison is a stunning and rather kitsch 1950s cotton featuring bud bases filled with deep orangey red roses. on a soft bluey grey background with black graphics. ONE OF ONLY 3 made.

Pictured is our medium drum shade measures 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9")high. The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. For other sizes/shapes available see listing or make us a special request request to hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

Our lampshades are made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. We have lots of beautiful vintage and retro fabrics so if you don't see the perfect shade here then please get in touch and we''ll be happy to discuss making up something just for you.

name: 1970s Lucy "mop cap" lampshade
description:
Add instant cheeriness to any room with one of our new "mop cap" lampshades.
Made with original vintage 1970s cotton barkcloth called Lucy that has been professionally treated with a fireproofing spray. 
The frame itself is brand new and is exclusive to FollyandGlee. It has a gimble fitting, a European aperture and a removeable UK converter! This means it will fit those wonderful coloured textile cable lamp holders, an ordinary ceiling pendant fixing or your favourite table lamp.
The frame measures 30cm diameter.
We are happy to make this style of shade in any of our vintage fabrics - get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you'd like to browse the full selection.

name: Posy X Large Retro Drum
description:
A rare find - original vintage barkcloth from the 1950s featuring stunning very soft pink rose blooms with gloriously detailed foliagein an oyster grey.

Posy  is seen here on a handrolled lampshade in our extra large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s.  

1 of only 3 made. Measures 38cm (15") high and 51cm (20") diameter.

Just ask us for a spider to convert the duplex ring to a pendant fitting if you'd prefer  to hang it as an oversize ceiling pendant. If your floor lamp has no shade carrier already fitted you can add one of those to your order at checkout. 

Do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you love the Posy fabric but are looking for an alternative shape or size shade at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

All FollyandGlee lampshades are made with a flame retardant lampshade PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

name: Aasta Barkcloth Fabric Patchwork Scrap Bags
description:
x3 at 30cm squares of gorgeous  barkcloth perfect for patchwork and crafting. 

All original vintage cotton barkcloths from the 1930s - 1970s collected by me over many years.

Barkcloth has a wonderful distinctive double open weave and nubby texture. Hardwearing but super soft and the depth of colour is unbeatable.

name: Symli Yellow Rose Barkcloth Shade
description:
We love the mustard and grey combination of the original vintage Smyli cotton barkcloth. This is the perfect beside lampshade or ceiling pendant for a smaller space. The shades measure 20cm (8")diameter and 23cm (9")high

We use professional quality and fire retardant lampshade PVC and each is fitted with a adjustor for UK and European light fittings.

name: Kasbah extra large retro lampshade
description:
Funky - as crisp and as bright as first printed way by when - Kasbah is a 60s classic barkcloth in turquoises and blues.
Used  here on a handrolled lampshade in our extra large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s.  Just ask us for a spider to convert the duplex ring to a pendant fitting if you'd prefer  to hang it as an oversize ceiling pendant as photographed. 1 of only 2 made. Measures 38cm (15") high and 51cm (20") diameter.

Do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you love the Kasbah fabric but are looking for an alternative shape or size shade at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

All FollyandGlee lampshades are made with a flame retardant lampshade PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

name: Sable Large Retro Drum
description:
An authentic tapered retro drum in Sable barkcloth measuring 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. Perfect for a standard floor lamp and SUPER as a statement ceiling pendant.
Sable is a very collectible cotton barkcloth from the 1950s featuring huge cabbage roses in beautiful shades of blue on an ivory background with pale grey foliage. Very crisp and fresh with no fade. Lovely.

name: Gough 30cm Drum Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade made from a vintage cotton barkcloth fabric called Gough and  a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Gough is an original barkcloth from the 1970s and is so named given the Vincent Van G like combination of painterly stokes of blues, purples, lilacs. Stunning.   

Pictured is our medium drum shade measures 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9")high.  The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. For other sizes/shapes available see listing or make us a special request request to hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Kanye x-large retro drum lampshade
description:
The perfect marriage of on trend coral/clementine and smoke colours and a graphic print in one spectacular original vintage barkcloth called Kanye. Kanye is seen here on a handrolled lampshade in our extra large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s.  Just ask us for pendant fitting if you'd prefer  to hang it as an oversize ceiling pendant. 1 of only 3 made. Measures 38cm (15") high and 51cm (20") diameter.

Do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you love the Kanye fabric but are looking for an alternative shape or size shade at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

All FollyandGlee lampshades are made with a flame retardant lampshade PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

name: Mintrose Patchwork Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a patchwork of a fab selection of  vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics from the 50s/60s and 70s sewn to professional quality flame retardant white PVC. Features a variety of original barkclothsall in deep red and minty green. Great balance of rose florals, scenic and graphic prints.

Can be used with a table/floor lamp or a ceiling light fitting.

Made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. Standard size 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9") high as photogrpahed.

Other sizes available. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: 12" scallop bell lampshade frame
description:
A rather new fabulous addition to our scallop bell lampshade frames all ready for you to paint, wrap or cover. 
This rather handy little beauty measures 12" (31cm) bottom diameter and is an elegant  11 3/4" (30cm) tall. 
As are all our frames it has a European fitting to work with our ceramic and brass lamp fittings and retro bulbs AND its got a reversible gimble - that's the moveable arm thingy that lets you hand it as a ceiling pendant or use it as a table lamp.

name: Applause barkcloth lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from a stunning mid century modern cotton barkcloth fabric called Applause and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Applause is a cotton barkcloth fresh off the roll and new old stock. Soft coppery bronze background with chocolate graphic lines and soft bluey grey roses with chocolate foliage. My current favourite! 
Our large drum shade as photographed measures 45(18")diameter and  25cm (10")high.  One of only 3 made.

The shades can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. Please specify on ordering.

Custom sizes/shapes available on request.

name: "Folksy Girl" lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a patchwork of our favourite vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics from the 50s/60s and 70s sewn to professional quality flame retardant white PVC. Features a variety of original barkcloths in orange and russet including a super cute folksy girl.

Please specify whether to be fitted for use as a table/floor lamp or a ceiling light fitting at time of ordering.

Made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. Standard size 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9") high as photogrpahed.  

Other sizes available. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Barkcloth Mini Bunting Flags - Darcey
description:
A mini bunting flag garland made by hand from the delectable Darcey original vintage barkcloth.
You receive a garland with 12 double sided flags to be hung with confidence from any angle. Each flag measures approximately 3cm. The total length of the garland is 1 metre.
The flags hang from organic cotton divine twine in cherry and come with a mini-spool of handcut barkcloth sticky tape. There's enough to hang your garland with and many more projects besides.

Custom lengths available on request.

name: 3 Large Barkcloth Buttons - Darcey
description:
A carded set of 3 large 4cm fabric buttons covered in Darcey original vintage barkcloth.

Perfect for your every crafting need including gift wrap, jewellery making or rejuvinating a favourite piece of clothing with a vintage edge. The perfect gift for a button loving friend.

Professionally made to a very high standard on Arthur the re-conditioned button machine in the Folly&Glee studio.

name: Barkcloth Buttons x6 - Darcey
description:
A carded set of 6 super cute fabric buttons covered in Darcey original vintage barkcloth.

Perfect for your every crafting need including gift wrap, jewellery making or rejuvinating a favourite piece of clothing with a vintage edge. The perfect gift for a button loving friend.

Professionally made to a very high standard on Arthur the re-conditioned button machine in the Folly&Glee studio.

name: Pica Vintage Barkcloth Fabric Scrap bag
description:
x3 at 30cm squares of gorgeous  barkcloth perfect for patchwork and crafting. 

All original vintage cotton barkcloths from the 1930s - 1970s collected by me over many years.

Barkcloth has a wonderful distinctive double open weave and nubby texture. Hardwearing but super soft and the depth of colour is unbeatable.

You will receive the 3 fabrics photographed - there is a very limited quantity of each.

Barkcloth has a wonderful distinctive double open weave and nubby texture. Hardwearing but super soft and the depth of colour is unbeatable.

name: Pop Lined Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Super cute shade with an outer in an original 1970s barkcloth in a graphic print called Gough with an inner lining of complimentary blue floral Pop.

This is the perfect size beside lampshade. The shades measure 20cm (8")diameter and 23cm (9") high.

We use professional quality and fire retardant lampshade PVC and each is fitted with a adjustor for UK and European light fittings.

name: Carla Vintage barkcloth lampshades
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from a stunning mid century modern cotton barkcloth fabric called Carla and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Carla is a cotton barkcloth fresh off the roll origin date guessed late 1960s featuring a tropical design in vibrant orange, yellow and green.
Our large drum shade as photographed measures 45(18")diameter and  25cm (10")high.  Available in lots of other sizes too. The shades can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. 

Custom sizes/shapes available on request.

name: Red and White stripe lamp flex
description: Red and white stripe 3 core flex. Made in Italy.

name: Mavis's little sister
description:
Mavis has an elegant little sister. She measures 12" (31cm) bottom diameter and is 11 3/4" (30cm) tall. 
A timeless original vintage barkcloth handsewn and finished with organic cotton trim.
As are all our frames it has a European fitting to work with our ceramic and brass lamp fittings and retro bulbs AND its got a reversible gimble - that's the moveable arm thingy that lets you hand it as a ceiling pendant or use it as a table lamp.

name: Cherry Blossom Patchwork Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a patchwork of our favourite vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics from the 50s/60s and 70s sewn to professional quality flame retardant white PVC. Features a variety of original barkcloths all adorned with  cherry blossom- some scenic, some graphic.

Can be used with a table/floor lamp or a ceiling light fitting.

Made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. Standard size 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9") high as photogrpahed.  

Other sizes available. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Homemaker Magazine DIY Patchwork Lampshade Kit-
description:
As featured in Homemaker Magazine. Everything you need to make your own no-sew pannelled patchwork lampshade. A perfect original gift for a crafty friend.

Your kit includes: a panel lampshade frame suitable for use as a ceiling pendant or table lampshade. It measures 20cm (8") bottom diameter and is 22cm tall; a roll of professional quality self adhesive white lampshade PVC that is flame retardant and approved by the Lighting Association; a 5 metre roll of heat resistant double sided tape; full instructions plus your choice of fabric panels and trim. 

Choose from 3 christmassy fabric options. The vintage red pack includes a cotton scenic print with a toning holly print and a vibrant original 70s patchwork finished with red ric rac. The pink/green pack features a graphic christmas tree cotton with a 1930s rose floral and a classic red polka dot again with a red ric rac trim. The blue/silver pack includes a beautiful original vintage Sanderson blue rose with a silver velvet and a cotton folksy print with cross-stitch deer plus a grey and blue ribbon trim.

Not feeling Christmasy? You can use this kit to make yourself a lampshade in your own fabric or why not take a browse through the fabric scrap bags for your perfect combination of vintage barkcloths - there is plenty in every bag to make this lampshade.

name: Winter Mini-Bell Patchwork Lampshade
description:
Ridiculously cute mini scallop bell lampshade handsewn with a patchwork of original vintage barkcloths including one of the last patches of the fabulous Early Springtime Grandma Moses barkcloth. See the gaggle of geese enjoying the first grass peeping up from below the melting snow? 
All the panels are handsewn and finished with an organic cotton braid and trim.
Thanks to the ingenious reversable gimble fitting you can use this shade as a ceiling pendant or as a small table or wall lamp. And even better....they come with a European aperture (42mm) that fits those trendy coloured flex lamp holders plus a converter for UK (28mm) light fittings.
Our mini scallop bell measures 17 cm (6 1/2" ) base diameter and is 20cm (8") high.

name: Classic Procelain Lampholder
description:
Classic E27 porcelain lampholder for an ES standard screw bulb.

An elegant look and so very tactile in ivory porcelain.

There is no shade ring but can be opened and tightened to hold any of our lampshade frames.

Cable/Flex not included.

name: 1950/60s barkcloth rose curtains
description:
Gorgeous yellow rose cotton barkcloth curtains. Originals from the 1950s/60s. Perfect condition. Never hung so super crisp and bright with no fading. Includes two holdbacks.
Measure 123cm (48 1/2") long and 168cm (66") wide. The heading tape is 7cm (3") deep and the curtains have a machined hem of 7cm (2 1/2").

name: "Inside-Out" Mid-Century Retro Lampshades
description:
Just want to add a touch of mid century retro style without going too way out? Try our "inside - out"  handrolled lampshades which create a beautifully warm light when on with the pattern reflected though the outer linen.  As chosen by Jamie Oliver for his new Gatwick restaurant.
Photographed here in an unbleached natural linen outer with an  original vintage cotton barkcloth lining called  Obean - soft greens, golds and yellow.  There are lots of other options too including: Linnea - astunning mid century red floral on bright lime green foliage and Jules - a 50s classic graphc in mustard and grey.  Strictly limited editions of 3 per fabric.  
Measures 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. This is our   large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s. As seen in the new Jamie Oliver restaurant.

Finished with a hand rolled edge on a professional quality fire retardant PVC. Just let us know if you need a lampshade carrier ( for a standard lamp) or a spider( if you'd like to make a real statement and hang as a ceiling pendant).

Other sizes and shapes available on request.

name: Mini Scallop Bell Lampshade Frame
description:
Well you asked for a smaller cuter version and so here it is.  A beautiful mini scallop bell lampshade frame ready for you to wrap with your favourite fabrics, paint your choice of colour or even re-cover the traditional way. 
What' so special about FollyandGlee lamp shade wire frames? Well thanks to the ingenious reversible gimble fitting you can use them as a ceiling pendant or with a table lamp. And even better....they come with a European aperture (42mm) that fits those trendy coloured flex lamp holders plus a converter for UK (28mm) light fittings.
Our mini scallop bell measures 17 cm (6 1/2" ) base diameter and is 20cm (8") high.

NB: If covering your lamp shade frame do please take care to ensure that you use a low wattage light bulb, that any bulb is at least 5cm away from the sides of the shade and treat fabric with a flame retardant spray.

name: Retro HEMO cupboard knobs
description:
Original 1950s HEMO plastic retro cupboard  or drawer knobs in fabulous ice-cream colours. Measure 23mm diameter. 
Perfect for finishing your revamped cabinets or why not use a few as jewellery hangers.

name: Tulip Lampshade Frame
description:
Another new addition to our range of unadorned lampshade frames in the most beautiful tulip shade yet. Ready for you to wrap with your favourite fabrics, paint your choice of colour or even re-cover the traditional way. 

Our large tulip shade measures 41 cm (16" ) base diameter and is 25cm (9 1/2") high.Fitted with a European pendant aperture (42mm) that fits those trendy coloured flex lamp holders plus a converter for UK (28mm) light fittings.

NB: If covering your lamp shade frame do please take care to ensure that you use a low wattage light bulb, that any bulb is at least 5cm away from the sides of the shade and treat fabric with a flame retardant spray.

name: Helle barkcloth lampshade
description:
This fabulous 50s barkcloth in a vibrant red with a beautiful hellebore type flower or "christmas rose" is lsuper stylish on a tall taper lampshade frame measuring 31cm high with a bottom diameter of 25cm and a top diameter of 20cm. This is a shade that looks equally good as a table lamp or as a ceiling pendant.

1 of only 3 made. 

All FollyandGlee shades have handrolled edges and a Lighting Association approved fire retardant white PVC.

Love the Helle fabric but need a different size or shape of shade - just get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Helle Patchwork Scallop Bell
description:
Brighten up any room with this handsewn patchwork shade. Features two beautiful complimentary barkcloths. One with a deep red background and a hellebore flower. The other a classic 50s rose on a taupe background with a very subtle nautical imprint of sailing boats. Its a very useful size size (31cm bottom diameter x 30 cm high) and beacuse of the reversible gimble suitable as both a table lamp of a ceiling pendant.
Sewn completely by hand with each panel finished with an organic linen braid and trim.
One of 2 made.

name: "Desert Rose" Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a patchwork of our favourite vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics from the 50s/60s and 70s sewn to professional quality flame retardant white PVC. Features predominantly turquoise and yellow prints. Can be used with a table/floor lamp or a ceiling light fitting.

Made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. Standard size 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9") high as photogrpahed.  

Other sizes available. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Danish Modern Standard Floor Lamps
description:
Choose from our ever changing stock of super stylish Danish Modern teak standard lamps form the early 1960s. Lovely wood and brass poles in great condition. Fully rewired, new textile flex and PAT tested by a qualified electrician.

Why not top your new standard lamp off with a extra large or large retro drum lampshade in an authentic original vintage barkcloth. 

Just get in touch hello@follyandglee.co.uk and request photos of exisiting stock and those lamps currently in the workshop plus your preferred fabric colourway/era etc. in stock.

name: Haldana Vintage barkcloth 45cm lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from a stunning mid century modern cotton barkcloth fabrics called Haldana and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Haldana is a cotton barkcloth fresh off the roll and new old stock. Super crisp and bright red and orange graphic with grey flowers with a pink centre. Funky.
Our large drum shade as photographed measures 45(18")diameter and  25cm (10")high.  The shades can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. 

Custom sizes/shapes available on request.

name: Aasta  Barkcloth Large retro drum Shade
description:
A great NEW addition to the range of lampshade sizes and shapes. This is the same tapered retro drum but just a little smaller at 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. Perfect for the smaller standard floor lamp and SUPER as a statement ceiling pendant.

Up first is the very lovely Aasta - brand new old stock straight off the roll early 1970s barkcloth with a laminated fire retardant lampshade PVC.  Aasta has absolutely no fading the blues, turquoises, teals and purples really pop against a bright white background. 

The retro drum is available to order in anyone of our fabulous collection of vintage barkcloths. just as if you'd like to browse the full selection.

name: Lucy Vintage Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from a vintage cotton barkcloth fabric and  a laminated flame retardant white PVC.Lucy is an original barkcloth from the 1960s featuring a crazy mix of yellow and orange graphics and floral designs. This fabric never fails to raise a smile - a little pice of sunshine in fabric form.   ONE OF ONLY 3 made. 

Pictured is our medium drum shade measures 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9")high.  The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. For other sizes/shapes available see listing or make us a special request request to hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

Our lampshades are made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. We have lots of beautiful vintage and retro fabrics so if you don't see the perfect shade here then please get in touch and we''ll be happy  to discuss making up something just for you.

name: 16" Scallop bell lampshade frame
description:
At last! A beautiful scallop bell lampshade frame ready for you to wrap with your favourite fabrics, paint your choice of colour or even re-cover the traditional way. 

Our scallop bell measures 40 cm (16" ) base diameter and is 34cm (13 1/2") high and are powdercoated white.

What' so special about FollyandGlee lamp shade wire frames? Well thanks to the ingenious removeable fittings you can use them as a ceiling pendant or with a standard floor/table lamp. 

The frame is fitted with a standard Duplex ring. If you'd like to hang it as a pendant ask for a spider with a European aperture (42mm) that fits those trendy coloured flex lamp holders plus a converter for UK (28mm) light fittings. If you want to use your shade with a floor lamp you'll need a shade carrier. Please do specify at checkout.

NB: If covering your lamp shade frame do please take care to ensure that you use a low wattage light bulb, that any bulb is at least 5cm away from the sides of the shade and treat fabric with a flame retardant spray.

options.name: as a ceiling pendant with spider
as a floor lamp with shade carrier

name: Sandy 1970s barkcloth Mop Cap Lampshade
description:
Add instant cheeriness to any room with one of our new "mop cap" lampshades.
Made with original vintage 1970s cotton barkcloth called Sandy that has been professionally treated with a fireproofing spray. 
The frame itself is brand new and is exclusive to FollyandGlee. It has a gimble fitting, a European aperture and a removeable UK converter! This means it will fit those wonderful coloured textile cable lamp holders, an ordinary ceiling pendant fixing or your favourite table lamp.
The frame measures 30cm diameter.
We are happy to make this style of shade in any of our vintage fabrics - get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you'd like to browse the full selection.

name: Set of 12 gift tags
description:
Set of 12 circular gift tags in a host of florals and graphic prints.

Use in conjunction with our co-ordinating wrapping paper, gift bags, boxes and bakers twine for stunning gifts .

name: Zebedee Large Retro Drum
description:
This is the same tapered retro drum as the x large but just a little smaller at 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. Perfect for the smaller standard floor lamp and SUPER as a statement ceiling pendant.
Seen here in Zebedee anl early 1970s barkcloth with a laminated fire retardant lampshade PVC.  Zebedee has absolutely no fading the ornages, yellows and browns really pop against a bright white background. Opt to enjoy it alone in all its glory or pair with some rather fabulous chocolate or burnt orange vintage cottom pom pom trim. the choice is yours...

The retro drum is available to order in anyone of our fabulous collection of vintage barkcloths. just as if you'd like to browse the full selection.

options.name: burnt orange vintage pom pom trim

name: "In the Pink" Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshade by Folly&Glee made from a patchwork of our favourite vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics from the 50s/60s and 70s sewn to professional quality flame retardant white PVC. Features the prettiest florals and glamarous rose blooms. 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9") high. Can be used with a table/floor lamp or a ceiling light fitting.

Made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. 

Other sizes available. Please do get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

name: Orlessa vintage barkcloth 45cm lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from a stunning mid century modern cotton barkcloth fabric called Orlessa and a laminated flame retardant white PVC. Orlessa is a cotton barkcloth origin date guessed late 1960s featuring a graphic design in vibrant green, burnt oranges,and creams.

Our large drum shade as photographed measures 45(18")diameter and  25cm (10")high.  The shades can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. 

Custom sizes/shapes available on request.

name: Mia Blossom Barkcloth Lampshade
description:
Brand new quality rolled edge lampshades by Folly&Glee made from not one but two vintage cotton barkcloth fabrics and  a laminated flame retardant white PVC. 
The yellow and grey graphic  print is called Mia and is an original barkcloth from the 1950s. The shade is lined with a Pink Blossom barkcloth from the 60s . We love how they work together.   
ONE OF ONLY 2 made. 

Pictured is our medium drum shade measures 30cm (12")diameter and 23 cm (9")high.  The shade can be fitted for use with a table/floor lamp or as a ceiling pendant. For other sizes/shapes available see listing or make us a special request request to hello@follyandglee.co.uk.

Our lampshades are made by hand with genuine vintage fabrics to a very high standard. We have lots of beautiful vintage and retro fabrics so if you don't see the perfect shade here then please get in touch and we''ll be happy  to discuss making up something just for you.

name: Virginia Scallop Bell Lampshade
description:
Virginia is a stunning original vintage barkcloth featuring cerise pink and yellow long stemmed roses amidst a variety of expertly drawn foliage. The depth of colour is amazing. Handsewn and finished with an organic cottom trim Virginia measures 12" (31cm) bottom diameter and is 11 3/4" (30cm) tall. 

As are all our frames it has a European fitting to work with our ceramic and brass lamp fittings and retro bulbs AND its got a reversible gimble - that's the moveable arm thingy that lets you hand it as a ceiling pendant or use it as a table lamp.

name: Inside Out Polly ceiling pendant
description:
"Inside -out" ceiling pendant with a plain linen outer with an original vintage fabric lining called Polly.

Photographed is our medium retro tapered drum style ceiling pedant lampshade. As chosen by Jamie Oliver for his Gatwick restaurant.

Perfect if you'd love a touch of modern vintage or retro without going too way out. "Inside - out" handrolled lampshades create a beautifully warm light when on with the pattern reflected though the outer 100% linen. Strictly limited editions of 3 per fabric.
An unbleached natural linen outer with an original vintage cotton barkcloth lining called Polly - huge oversized rose blooms in yellow, red and peach with mustard and olive foliage and striking black stems.

This is the last of only 3 made and is fitted for use as a ceiling pendant. Finished with a hand rolled edge on a professional quality fire retardant PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

Measures 35cm (14") base diameter and 30cm (12") top diameter and 35cm high.

Other sizes and shapes of lampshade in these combinations of fabric available on request. Looking for a different colourway or pattern - let us know we have 100s of options and are happy to send you suggestions.

name: Bewley Large Retro Drum Lampshade
description:
Bewley is a to die for original vintage barkcloth featuring an array of gorgeous english country garden bloms in an array of subtle pinks, reds, yellows and greens on a pale grey.  Pictured is our large size tapered retro drum measuring 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. Perfect for a standard floor lamp and SUPER as a statement ceiling pendant.
Just get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you would like an alternative size or shape lampshade making in this gorgeous barkcloth.

name: Dandier mid-century modern lampshades
description:
Stunning original midcentury modern barkcloth featuring a giant and exquisitely detailed seed head. 

Made to order in any size to suit the proportions of your lamp or pendant fitting. Choose from the popular sizes listed or get in touch at hello@follyandglee.co.uk if you need something taller or wider.

All FollyandGlee lampshades are made with a flame retardant lampshade PVC approved by the Lighting Association.

name: NEW "inside out" mid century retro lampshades
description:
Just want to add a touch of mid century retro style without going too way out? Try our "inside - out"  handrolled lampshades which create a beautifully warm light when on with the pattern reflected though the outer linen.  As chosen by Jamie Oliver for his  Gatwick restaurant.
Photographed here in an unbleached natural linen outer with an  original vintage cotton barkcloth lining called  Bettina - ditsy rose florals on a natural background.  There other options two including: Hazel - a  striking mid century leaf print in olive and black and Glynde - a 50s classic florals iwith large blooms of soft blue, teal and deep pink. Strictly limited editions of 3 per fabric.  

Measures 47cm (18") base diameter and 33cm (13") high. This is our   large retro tapered drum style. The authentic style and shape for any revamped standard floor lamp from the 1950s and 1960s. As seen in the new Jamie Oliver restaurant.

Finished with a hand rolled edge on a professional quality fire retardant PVC. Just let us know if you need a lampshade carrier ( for a standard lamp) or a spider( if you'd like to make a real statement and hang as a ceiling pendant).

Other sizes and shapes available on request.
